categories: Category:Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures episodes

nodes.text: Darth Vader - Power of the Dark Side
"Darth Vader - Power of the Dark Side" is the second episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the StarWarsKids.com and the Disney Go websites on November 30, 2018.

During the secret mission to Tatooine a squad of rebel troopers take up position in a dark corridor on the Tantive IV. Darth Vader approaches them and ignites his lightsaber. He tells them that they don't know the power of the dark side. The rebel troopers fire their blasters but he deflects their blaster bolts with his lightsaber. Armed with his lightsaber, Lord Vader proceeds to cut down the rebel troopers. He also uses the Force to snatch their blasters, hurl his lightsaber at the troopers, and hurls two of the troopers against each other.

Soon Lord Vader finds himself facing one last rebel trooper. After slicing his blaster, he levitates the man with the Force and proceeds to Force choke him in mid-air before hurling him across the corridor. The lights in the corridors then come back on, leaving Darth Vader towering over the fallen bodies of the rebel troopers. As a squad of stormtroopers join him, Vader surmises it was all too easy before striking a fallen rebel soldier with his lightsaber.
